mapper.insert: insert into PBCRS_REPORT_ENACCTBSSGMT (ACCTBSSGMTSEQNO, INFRECTYPE, ACCTTYPE, ACCTCODE, RPTDATE, RPTDATECODE, NAME, IDTYPE, IDNUM, MNGMTORGCODE,ReportFlag) values (#{AcctBsSgmtSeqNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{InfRecType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{AcctType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{AcctCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{RptDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{RptDateCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{Name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{IDType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{IDNum,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{MngmtOrgCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{ReportFlag,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.update: update PBCRS_REPORT_ENACCTBSSGMT set INFRECTYPE = #{InfRecType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ACCTTYPE = #{AcctType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ACCTCODE = #{AcctCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, RPTDATE = #{RptDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, RPTDATECODE = #{RptDateCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, NAME = #{Name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, IDTYPE = #{IDType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, IDNUM = #{IDNum,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, MNGMTORGCODE = #{MngmtOrgCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ReportFlag=#{ReportFlag,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ORG_CODE = #{MngmtOrgCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where ACCTBSSGMTSEQNO = #{AcctBsSgmtSeqNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: select ACCTBSSGMTSEQNO, INFRECTYPE, ACCTTYPE, ACCTCODE, RPTDATE, RPTDATECODE, NAME, IDTYPE, IDNUM, MNGMTORGCODE,REPORTFLAG,SOURCESYS,ORG_CODE from PBCRS_REPORT_ENACCTBSSGMT where ACCTBSSGMTSEQNO = #{AcctBsSgmtSeqNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
select ACCTBSSGMTSEQNO, INFRECTYPE, ACCTTYPE, ACCTCODE, RPTDATE, RPTDATECODE, NAME, IDTYPE, IDNUM, MNGMTORGCODE,ReportFlag from PBCRS_REPORT_ENACCTBSSGMT
select count(1) from PBCRS_REPORT_ENACCTBSSGMT bb where 1=1
select count(1) from PBCRS_REPORT_ENACCTBSSGMT t where t.bad_flag = '1' and t.etl_date = to_date(#{ETL_DATE},'yyyymmdd')
